column1: In a stringent effort to control the spread of the novel coronavirus, the Tamil Nadu government on Friday closed its inter-state borders with Kerala, Karnataka and Andhra Pradesh for vehicle traffic till March 31.  News here https://www.theweek.in/news/india/2020/03/20…    https://english.manoramaonline.com/news/kera…
Tough decision, but maybe the right one
